## BUSINESS PROFILE

### Company Information
Name: TIGON Personal Transportation Vehicles
Short Name: TIGON PTV
Industry: Personal Transportation Vehicle Sales, Service, and Rentals
Business Type: Authorized PTV Dealership
Website: https://tigonptv.com
Email: info@tigonptv.com
Phone: 1-844-844-6638

### Business Description
TIGON PTV is North America's premier personal transportation vehicle dealership, specializing in DENAGO and EVOLUTION electric vehicles. We provide comprehensive sales, service, rental, and financing solutions for customers seeking eco-friendly, street-legal transportation alternatives across all 50 United States, Canada, and Mexico.

### Brands Represented
Primary Brands:
- DENAGO Electric Vehicles
- EVOLUTION Electric Vehicles

### Service Areas
Coverage: All 50 US States, Canada, Mexico
Nationwide delivery and service available

## COMPLETE VEHICLE INVENTORY FOR AI TRAINING

### DENAGO Vehicle Models (6 Models)

#### DENAGO EV City
- Type: 2-Passenger Street-Legal PTV
- Classification: Urban Commuter
- Top Speed: 25 mph (street legal)
- Range: 40 miles per charge
- Battery: 48V Lithium-ion (5.3 kWh)
- Motor: 3.5 HP AC Electric
- Charging Time: 6-8 hours (110V), 3-4 hours (220V)
- Dimensions: 95"L x 47"W x 66"H
- Weight Capacity: 500 lbs
- Curb Weight: 950 lbs
- Features: LED lights, USB charging, rear cargo, street-legal package
- Use Cases: Urban commuting, campus transportation, neighborhood travel
- Price Range: $8,000 - $12,000

#### DENAGO EV Nomad
- Type: 4-Passenger Adventure PTV
- Classification: All-Terrain Vehicle
- Top Speed: 25 mph
- Range: 50 miles per charge
- Battery: 48V Lithium-ion (7.2 kWh)
- Motor: 5 HP AC Electric
- Ground Clearance: 6 inches (lifted)
- Tires: 23" all-terrain
- Features: All-terrain capability, lifted suspension
- Use Cases: Camping, hunting, outdoor recreation, ranch work
- Price Range: $12,000 - $16,000

#### DENAGO EV Nomad XL
- Type: 6-Passenger Extended Adventure PTV
- Classification: Extended Capacity Adventure
- Top Speed: 25 mph
- Range: 60 miles per charge
- Battery: 72V Lithium-ion (10.8 kWh)
- Motor: 7.5 HP AC Electric
- Seating: 6 passengers (3-row)
- Features: Extended cargo, enhanced battery, premium suspension
- Use Cases: Group outdoor activities, large family transportation
- Price Range: $16,000 - $20,000

#### DENAGO EV Rover XL
- Type: 4-Passenger Luxury PTV
- Classification: Luxury Cruiser
- Top Speed: 25 mph
- Range: 50 miles per charge
- Features: Premium upholstery, Bluetooth audio, USB ports
- Price Range: $14,000 - $18,000

#### DENAGO EV Rover XL6
- Type: 6-Passenger Extended Luxury PTV
- Classification: Extended Luxury
- Top Speed: 25 mph
- Range: 55 miles per charge
- Seating: 6 passengers
- Features: Three-row seating, enhanced cargo area
- Price Range: $18,000 - $22,000

#### DENAGO EV Rover XXL
- Type: 8-Passenger Maximum Capacity PTV
- Classification: Maximum Capacity Luxury
- Top Speed: 25 mph
- Range: 60 miles per charge
- Battery: 72V Lithium-ion (14.4 kWh)
- Motor: 10 HP AC Electric
- Seating: 8 passengers (4-row)
- Features: Maximum passenger capacity, premium audio, climate control
- Price Range: $22,000 - $28,000

### EVOLUTION Vehicle Models (30+ Models)

#### EVOLUTION Classic Series
- Models: Classic 2 Plus, Classic 2 Pro, Classic 4 Plus, Classic 4 Pro
- Seating: 2-4 passengers
- Features: Traditional styling, modern electric drivetrain
- Price Range: $10,000 - $18,000

#### EVOLUTION D5 Maverick Series
- Models: Maverick 4, 4 Plus, 6, 6 Plus, 22, 22 Plus, 42 Plus
- Classification: Sport Performance
- Seating: 4-6 passengers
- Features: Sport-tuned suspension, performance-oriented design
- Price Range: $14,000 - $24,000

#### EVOLUTION D5 Ranger Series
- Models: Ranger 4, 4 Plus, 6, 6 Plus, 22, 22 Plus, 42 Plus
- Classification: Utility Performance
- Seating: 4-6 passengers
- Features: Utility-focused, enhanced cargo capacity
- Price Range: $14,000 - $24,000

#### EVOLUTION D6 Max Series
- Models: D6 Max GT4, GT6, XT4, XT6
- Classification: Premium Performance
- Seating: 4-6 passengers
- Features: Premium performance, luxury appointments
- Price Range: $18,000 - $28,000

#### EVOLUTION Carrier Series
- Models: Carrier 6 Plus, Carrier 8 Plus
- Classification: High-Capacity Transport
- Seating: 6-8 passengers
- Features: Maximum passenger capacity, versatile seating
- Price Range: $20,000 - $30,000

#### EVOLUTION Forester Series
- Models: Forester 4 Plus, Forester 6 Plus
- Classification: All-Terrain Utility
- Seating: 4-6 passengers
- Features: Rugged construction, off-road capability
- Price Range: $16,000 - $24,000

#### EVOLUTION Turfman Series
- Models: Turfman 200 Plus, 800 Plus, 1000, 1000 Plus
- Classification: Commercial/Utility
- Type: Work/Turf vehicles
- Top Speed: 15-20 mph
- Features: Turf-friendly tires, utility beds, commercial-grade
- Price Range: $12,000 - $20,000

- Daily rentals

- Monthly rentals
- Event rentals
- Corporate rentals
- Seasonal rentals
- Resort and community rentals

- Traditional financing
- Lease-to-own programs
- Zero-down financing
- Low-interest financing
- Commercial financing
- Fleet financing programs
- Credit approval assistance

## TECHNICAL SPECIFICATIONS DATABASE

### Battery Technology
- Primary Type: Lithium-ion batteries
- Voltage Options: 48V, 72V configurations
- Range: 40-70 miles depending on model
- Charging: Standard 110V (6-8 hours), 220V (3-4 hours)
- Lifespan: 5-7 years typical

### Motor Technology
- Type: AC Electric Motors
- Power Range: 3.5 HP - 10 HP
- Efficiency: High-efficiency regenerative braking
- Maintenance: Minimal - no oil changes

### Safety Features
- DOT-approved seat belts
- LED headlights and taillights
- Turn signals and hazard lights
- Rearview mirrors
- Windshield with wipers
- Horn
- Street-legal compliance

### Regulatory Compliance
- Classification: Low-Speed Vehicle (LSV) / Neighborhood Electric Vehicle (NEV)
- Maximum Speed: 25 mph (federal requirement)
- FMVSS 500 Compliant
- EPA Certified (zero emissions)
- DOT Approved safety equipment

### International
- Canada: All provinces
- Mexico: Northern and Central regions
